attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277465. Balance of a 2YR/30 000KM Service Plan and a 5YR/200 000KM Warranty Available.

This fun, dynamic and stylish vehicle comes with an array of safety features such as ABS, brake assist, airbags and security alarm. 
It also comes with cruise control, rear park distance control and rear-view camera for your driving pleasure. 
Other features include its alloy wheels, 4.2" colour LCD touchscreen, key-less entry, push start ignition, multi-functional steering wheel, central locking, Bluetooth connectivity and air-conditioning.
This DEMO Suzuki Vitara 1.4T GLX Auto is a compact SUV, capable of doing it all.

The vehicle is almost new.One previous owner.Accidental free.
The BR-V is among the most fuel-efficient cars in its segment, despite having a powerful engine. It returns around 7.5-liter/100km.The BR-V is a relaxed cruiser over long distance trips on the highways. The cabin of the BR-V is practical and apart from the generous amounts of space you also get several storage bins and bottle holders. The first and the second rows seats are very comfortable with plenty of headroom and legroom to spare.
